P

Kāraṇḍava，<sup>1</sup> [of uncertain etym．，cp．karaṇḍa] chaff，offal，sweepings，fig．dirt，impurity：yava° A．IV，169 （chaff）； samaṇa° ibid．-- In passage kāraṇḍavaṁ niddhamatha，kasambuṁ apakassatha A．IV，172=Sn．281=Miln．414 trsl<sup>d</sup> by Rh．Davids Miln．trsl．II．363 “get rid of filth，put aside rubbish from you，” expl．SnA 311 by kacavara （q．v．）．Rh．D’s note<sup>3</sup> Loc．cit．is to be modified according to the parallel passages just given．（Page 210）
